splash.js
¶ 
1  module.exports = Splash;
2  
3  function Splash() {
4    this.logo = null;
5  }
6  
7  Splash.prototype.create = function () {
8    var midx = this.game.world.centerX,
9      midy = this.game.world.centerY;
10  
11    var logo = this.logo = this.add.sprite(midx, midy + 20, 'phaserLogo');
12    logo.anchor.setTo(0.5, 0.5);
13    logo.alpha = 0;
14  
15    var fadeIn = this.game.add.tween(logo);
16    var hold = this.game.add.tween(logo);
17    var fadeOut = this.game.add.tween(logo);
18  
19  
20
¶

fade in and slightly move up, hold for a half sec, then fade out

 
20  
21    fadeIn.to({
22      alpha: 1,
23      y: midy
24    }, 1000, null, false);
25  
26    hold.to({
27      alpha: 1
28    }, 500, null, false);
29  
30    fadeOut.to({
31      alpha: 0
32    }, 500, null, false);
33  
34    fadeIn.chain(hold);
35    hold.chain(fadeOut);
36    fadeIn.start();
37  
38    fadeOut.onComplete.add(function () {
39      this.game.state.start('preloader');
40    }, this);
41  
42  };
